a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: This indicator shows annual anomalies compared with the average precipitation from 1901 to 2000 based on
rainfall and snowfall measurements from land-based weather stations worldwide.
Data source: National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) via the US EPA
Note: Global anomalies have been determined by dividing the world into a grid, averaging the data for each cell of the grid, and then
